select nvl(max(board_no),0)+1 from board where board_type=#{board_type}
insert into board(board_no, board_writer_no, board_title, board_contents, board_date, board_viewcount, board_type) values (#{board_no},2,#{board_title},#{board_contents},sysdate,0,#{board_type})
mapper.select: select board_no, employee_name as board_writer, board_title, board_date, board_viewcount from board, employee where BOARD.BOARD_WRITER_NO=EMPLOYEE.EMPLOYEE_NO and BOARD.BOARD_TYPE=#{board_type} order by board_no desc
mapper.update: update board set board_viewcount=board_viewcount+1 where board_type=#{board_type} and board_no=#{board_no}
